title: # 401 - Gabby Reece & ME
description:
Today I sit down with professional volleyball player, sports announcer, fashion model, actress and producer, Gabby Reece. We talk about what it’s like being married to Laird Hamilton, going to Florida State, her volleyball career, how she trains, how her and Laird parent their kids, and much more! 

This episode is brought to you by Buffalo Trace whiskey. Go to www.Buffalotrace.com to order.

This episode is brought to you by Policy Genius. In just a few minutes you can find your best price and apply at www.Policygenius.com

This episode is also brought to you by Whoop. Get 15% off your membership at www.whoop.com by using the promo code “BERT” at checkout

This episode is brought to you by Fiverr. Take Five and check out www.FIVERR.com and get 10% off your first order by using my code BERTCAST at checkout.

This episode is also brought to you by Bespoke Post. Get 20% off your first monthly box when you sign up at www.boxofawesome.com and enter the code “BERT” at checkout

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: www.bertbertbert.com

Twitter: www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer

Youtube: www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
